data.actual_result: The red result is changing even though it isn't in the original GIF

data.steps_to_repro: - Download the image in question:  - See that only the yellow square is blinking - Send the image with a message - Click on the image to bring up the image to the center of the screen - See that the image didn't change - Click outside of the image to dismiss the enlarged view - Look at the picture in the message, hovering over it if necessary - Notice that the red area started changing into dark yellow too
